remarks: The direct product of two metric spaces.  Definition 14-1.5 of [Gleason] p. 225.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsds.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsds.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsds.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsds.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsds.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsds.p $e |- P = ( dist ` T ) $.
xpsds.m $e |- M = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
xpsds.n $e |- N = ( ( dist ` S ) |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
xpsmet.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( Met ` X ) ) $.
xpsmet.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( Met ` Y ) ) $.
xpsmet $p |- ( ph -> P e. ( Met ` ( X X. Y ) ) ) $.
